title: Riot pls answer about low prio queue
body: Ok so when I leave a game it counts to my leaverbuster status but why dont those leaves decay off the list why is it that when i leave to games then 50 games later i leave i get low prio queues why does this happen pls answer riot

replies.body:
I'm a little confused what you are asking here?

If you're asking why you face restrictions after going through the low priority queue games - doing those games is not a free pass to start leaving again.

My recommendation would be to not leave any games at all.
